message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  We can always adjust later.
I think a 55/45 split is fairer, given the inflation factor.  Let's see if we can agree on this.
I understand the inflation is hitting us both, but I think a 50/50 split is the most fair way to proceed. It's an even division, and lets us both get the most out of this deal.
